title: Winter Break
description: The journey continues for this group of friends...One secret will tear them all apart. One man's quest to end his life will heal them in a way none of them could have anticipated."We've all fought hard to get to where we are, but as strong as it's made us, none of us should be foolish enough to believe that what we've built is indestructible."Winter Break is a full length novel that picks up where Summer Tour leaves off, but it is a complete story that can be read as a standalone. It is intended for mature audiences due to profanity, sexual situations and recreational drug use
author: Diane Matlick
